short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stores and allows lookup of Log Analytics queries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will save any Log Analytics query you submit and allow you to search through your query history.
To search, simply enter a phrase you remember from the query you want to look for and hit ALT + R.
You can cycle through the results by pressing ALT + R again.
